title: What is Kojima Hiding!? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.15.22
description:
Go to http://meundies.com/KINDAFUNNY for 20% off your first order and free shipping.

Go to http://shopify.com/kfgames to get a free 14-day trial.

Blessing and Tim talk about what Kojima's teasing, Street Fighter 6 looking incredible, and big news from TGS aka Tokyo Game Show.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:09 - Housekeeping
Our latest She Hulk spoiler conversation is up right now as a Kinda Funny Screencast. That’s on Youtube.com/kindafunny and on your podcast service of choice.
A new Kinda Funny podcast is up. Nick fell off a horse and Kevin fell too. You know where to find that.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:54 - What is Kojima teasing??
00:15:53 - Street Fighter 6 got a lot of new details at TGS
00:25:15 - Deathloop is officially coming to Xbox
00:28:23 - Overwatch 2 has revealed a new hero
00:30:04 - UK watchdog officially launches in-depth probe of Xbox’s Activision deal
00:32:41 - G4TV Hit With Major Layoffs
00:37:12 - Quick hit: We got some Resident Evil 4 news
00:43:31 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Bless
